climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: DESIGNED TO DISSOLVE WITH EASE - Unlike some laundry products, these sheets dissolve within seconds when added to the washing machine with clothes and water. Once you've finished the load of laundry in the washing machine, you'll see no signs of the sheet or any residue left behind. You'll only have a washing machine full of clean clothes that feel soft and smell amazing!

MADE USING PLANT EXTRACTS AND ACTIVE ESSENCES - These laundry detergent sheets contain plant extracts and active essences. These gentle, high-quality ingredients won't irritate the skin or leave you with an uncomfortable rash throughout the body. You can wash your clothes without worrying about having a possible reaction to the detergent you're using.

NSTANT FRESHNESS AND CLEANING - The Maravello washer cleaner delivers instant cleaning by dissolving and eliminating residues, grime, dirt, and other impurities. It also can help remove foul odors, leaving the washing machine clean and fresh!

GENTLE AND NON-IRRITATING FORMULA - Our lightweight and convenient laundry detergent sheets are safe to use, even if you have sensitive skin. They contain only the finest ingredients made to clean clothes, provide a fresh scent, and keep skin comfortable without causing any unwanted irritation.

PERFECT FOR ALL CLOTHES AND GARMENTS - No matter what you're cleaning in the washing machine, you can use these incredible laundry sheets. Maravello's Laundry Detergent Sheets are perfect for use on clothes belonging to adults, teens, young children, and even babies. In addition to using the sheets to clean your clothes, you can also use them for other items that you need to wash, including your blankets, bedsheets, pet furniture, pillowcases, and much more.
body.description: Maravello Laundry Detergent Sheets Clean, Green, Hygienic，Choose Our Future Maravello specializes in providing professional cleaning products and solutions meant to keep your equipment and appliances in optimal conditions for longer. We are careful to select high-quality ingredients and powerful formulas that enable us to deliver safe and effective cleaning solutions that will never disappoint in terms of performance. If you are not 100% pleased with your purchase, we are always at your disposal for any issues or concerns. Maravello laundry strips are over 70% active. Maravello laundry strip packaging is made from 100% recyclable. Highly ideal for use by people traveling, camping, or living in a dormitory or household that has minimal space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time trying detergent sheets to do laundry. I didn't even know they existed until I saw something about them in an article online so I searched on Amazon and found these. I chose this brand mainly because the sheets didn't have to be torn like some others I saw and the price was great. I was very skeptical since I've always used traditional detergent, but these work great! They dissolve super quickly and have a very mild smell. My laundry came out of the washer clean and smelling fresh without harsh artificial scents which only mask the smell. I like that it's so easy to use - I use one sheet for small loads, 2 for medium or large, and 3 for extra large loads. I just throw them right on top where the water comes into my top-load washer and every load comes out perfectly. Because there is no coloring in them I don't have to worry about getting blue stains on my lights like I do with liquid detergent. Also I did not use fabric softener with these, whereas I usually used the liquid detergent with fabric softener in it. I didn't notice any difference at all with the softness of my laundry without the addition of the fabric softener. I'm very satisfied with this product and will continue to use it. It would be great for traveling due to it not being liquid and it's very lightweight, and perfect for those who use a laundromat because you only need to bring what you need. I will definitely order these again and even give as gifts because I don't know that many people know about these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space Saver! Great price!
reviews.reviewText: I love that these not only help save our landfills from being filled with plastic bottles, but they also save space in my laundry room. No more having to store big, bulky jugs of detergent! The sheets have a very pleasant scent that is not overpowering. Cleans clothes well. It is very convenient if you use a laundromat, as you can take just what you need to do your loads of laundry. Also great to take with you while traveling, as you could even use them to wash a few clothes in a sink or tub. Put them in a bag with your dirty clothes until time to wash them, and they will help you dirty clothes to not stink up the rest of your packed items. You could also put on in your laundry hamper to keep bad smells at bay until laundry day. Then just dump into your washer along with your clothes and you are good to go! These were the least expensive laundry sheets I could find, they clean well, help reduce plastic waste, and save on storage space, so they are a win, win, win, win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Your laundry sheets are AMAZING! I’ve told all my friends and family about them! I love the fact they’re not contributing to our overflow of trash and recycling! I’ve never liked the pods because they have stained my clothes. Don’t use the powder and the liquid jugs are heavy and use a lot of plastic to make! These sheets are incredible! No staining, clothes come out clean with no lingering smell and so convenient to use. We are planning a trip overseas and these will be in my luggage!! Unlike other brands, these are individual sheets so there is no tearing to separate and they are less expensive! I put them in an empty plastic tub and they all fit perfectly! I’m getting my 87 yr old Mom hooked on them! Jugs of detergent are so heavy for her! The sheets are perfect! One of the best purchases I’ve made! Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was Doubtful, But they really work. Just follow the directions!
reviews.reviewText: This was shocking! It has a almost fresh linen smell but not quite. Not over powerful but you know your cloths are clean. This is my 2nd order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells wonderful, and does a great job of cleaning. And my clothes are soft, yet they are fluffier than when I use liquid detergent and liquid fabric softener. Great for traveling, and makes your suitcase smell great as well! Definitely worth it! And it’s more economical than liquid, which is mostly water. Definitely going to subscribe and save on this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why keep paying for heavy jugs of soapy water when you have these?
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these for several months now and they work great. I bought the scented ones and the smell is not too strong; leaves clothes smelling clean but not overly perfumey. I haven't had any trouble with them failing to dissolve or glomming onto the tub of my washing machine except maybe once when I went overboard and put too many sheets in, and the small amount of residue on the side of the tub just dissolved on the next round of laundry.The sheets take up so much less space than liquid detergent or pods, with no leftover plastic jug. And it's kinda nice to know I'm not paying for water with my soap- the washing machine adds that anyway, right? If you have little kids or elderly people around who think pods look delicious, these should solve that problem.Detergent sheets also have to be the greatest thing ever for laundromat and college dorm use- no more lugging liquid, hoping you don't squish the pods on the way, paying for an overpriced box of whatever detergent is available, etc. Same reasons make them great for travel.So I'm now a laundry detergent sheet convert- and I think these particular ones are very good. I will be using them until the next great leap forward in laundry soap technology, which will hopefully involve a robot who can sense when the hamper is full and do the laundry for me while my 102 year old self is busy living in a virtual reality GenX paradise created just for old people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper, smaller, and WAY better for your washing machine.
reviews.reviewText: I will probably never go back to regular detergent—I am a laundry detergent sheet convert!Pros:- Saves a lot of space and barely weighs anything- Probably the cheapest option when it comes to detergent types- Will extend the life of your washing machine or at least reduce the amount of maintenance it requires; I've already noticed less soap scum and grime buildup on the glass window of my machine- Due to the small size of the product and the fact that it comes in a thin cardboard box instead of a hefty plastic container, the manufacturing and shipping process is way better for the environmentCons:- You're not going to get as much of that nice "perfumey" fresh laundry smell that you get from Tide or other brand name liquid or pod detergents, even with the scented sheets (I throw in a couple extra dryer sheets from a brand name to compensate for this)
